data.title: Seab Webster - Men's Basketball
data.meta_description: Seab Webster (24) Forward  - 2015-16: NABC All-South District First Team … D2CCCA All-South Region First Team … All-Gulf South Conference First Team … NCAA South
data.text:
2016-17 Men's Basketball Roster

Choose a Player:

Chuck Edgeworth

24 Seab Webster

Position Forward

Height 6-6

Weight 215

Class Senior

Hometown Gurley, Ala.

Prev School Madison County HS

Bio

Stats

Historical

Biography

2015-16: NABC All-South District First Team … D2CCCA All-South Region First Team … All-Gulf South Conference First Team … NCAA South Regional All-Tournament Team … GSC All-Tournament Team … Started all 33 contests for the Chargers during his junior season … Became the 23rd player in UAH history to record 1,000 career points … Ranked fifth in the GSC and led UAH with 16.7 points per game while ranking 12th in the conference and pacing the Chargers with 6.4 rebounds per contest … Ranked second in the conference in 3-pointers per game with 3.7 while featuring the fourth-best 3-pointer field goal percentage as he connected on 40.0 percent of his downtown attempts … Ranked 11th in the GSC with a 45.5 percent mark from the field … Breached the 30-point mark twice, scoring 33 on the strength of nine made 3-pointers at West Alabama (1/30) while registering 30 in NCAA South Regional quarterfinal win over Saint Leo (3/12) … Scored 20 or more points on 11 occasions … Logged four double-doubles on the year: 24 points, 12 rebounds at Shorter (2/6); 23 points, 12 rebounds at Christian Brothers (2/18); 15 points, 11 rebounds versus Tampa (11/13); and 21 points, 11 rebounds in GSC tournament quarterfinal win over Shorter (3/1).

2014-15: NABC All-South District Second Team … GSC All-Tournament Team … All-GSC Second Team honoree … Started all 32 games … Averaged 25.7 minutes per game … Led the team in scoring with an average of 15.1 points a game … Third on the roster with a rebounding average of 4.6 and 13 total blocks … Shot .430 (179-for-416) from the field … Had a 3-point percentage of .376 (65-for-173) … Totaled a season-high 33 points against Union (1/10) … Scored 28 points and was 7-for-9 on 3-pointers against North Alabama (3/3) in GSC Tournament quarterfinals … Scored 20 points or more on nine occasions … Registered a double-double with 19 points and 11 rebounds in the GSC Tournament Championship victory over West Alabama (3/7) … Tallied six or more rebounds 11 times … Scored 12 points and grabbed seven rebounds against Lynn (3/14) in NCAA South Regional … Played a season-best 34 minutes against Tampa (11/15).

2013-14: Recorded minutes in all 28 contests and started 15 games for the Chargers during his freshman season in Huntsville … Shot 48.4 percent from the field and connected on 45.8 percent of his 3-point attempts … Registered double figures in scoring in 11 contests … Recorded a double-double with 14 points and 10 rebounds at Delta State (2/1) … Scored a season-high 23 points against West Florida (2/6) as he connected on nine of his 13 shots from the field.

Prep: Played for father Bubba Webster at Madison County High School in Gurley, Ala. … Helped guide team to state championship during his senior season as he averaged 18 points, eight rebounds and six assists … Named first-team all-state and all-metro following his strong senior season and was also the most outstanding player at the state championships … Selected to play in the Alabama-Mississippi All-Star game … Named a second-team all-state performer following a junior season in which he averaged 16 points, nine rebounds and seven assists … Selected as an all-state honorable mention player his sophomore and freshman years.
